definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
to walk (side part of split character)
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this

sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亞伯拉罕信神，這就算爲他的義。

sentences.english: Both men had direct contact with dead chickens when feeding carcasses to their dogs.
sentences.chinese: 這兩名男子均在將死雞屍體餵狗時直接接觸了死雞。

sentences.english: It is not just about assuaging your conscience.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅是有關平息你的良心。

sentences.english: This article mainly introduces an improved system of mate-grinding servo valve.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了經這改進的伺服閥氣動配磨系統。

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.
sentences.chinese: 張靚穎在超級女聲的比賽中表演過這首歌。

sentences.english: It's part of the job description. - …
None of this will actually be decided at Bali.
sentences.chinese: 所有這一切實際上都決定在巴里島。

sentences.english: Of these four things , the first is your legal due.
sentences.chinese: 這四種中的第一件是你法律上應享的權力。

sentences.english: I seldom oppose Israel and Israeli teams these days.
sentences.chinese: 我很少反對以色列和以色列隊這幾天。

sentences.english: This great victory changed the complexion of the war .
sentences.chinese: 這次大捷使這戰爭改觀。

sentences.english: The big bed was specially made for Yao Ming, the giant basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 這張大牀是爲籃壇巨人姚明特製的。

sentences.english: That situation has often been compared to peeling the skins of an onion.
sentences.chinese: 這正如一層一層剝下洋蔥皮。

sentences.english: How much are the three Kodaks?
sentences.chinese: 這三架柯達照相機要多少錢？

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你們自己證明，是殺害先知者的子孫了。

sentences.english: Perhaps this corroborates what we say.
sentences.chinese: 也許這證實了我們的說法。

definition: to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
